INVALID_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
CANNOT_APPLY: {{author}} You cannot apply a `Frame` to a `3D` card

UF_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to apply the **{{frameName}}** `Frame` to this card?

UF_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} Successfully applied the **{{frameName}}** `Frame` to your card
